mapper.select: select visitor_note_no as no, minihome_no as miniHomeNo, user_no as userNo, visitor_note_content as content, visitor_note_secret as secret, visitor_note_deleted as deleted, visitor_note_created_date as createdDate from (select row_number() over(order by a.visitor_note_created_date desc) rn, a.* from minihome_visitor_notes a where minihome_no = #{miniHomeNo}) where rn = #{index}
